HDG.IWM.content: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]

HDG.QB.content: [khōra] Jünger’s Gestalt stamps/shapes its “forms” > Gestalt of worker corresponds to projection of essential Gestalt of Zarathustra w/in metaphysics of will to power [subjectity vs. subjectivity?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [khōra] Jünger’s Gestalt stamps/shapes its “forms” > Gestalt of worker corresponds to projection of essential Gestalt of Zarathustra w/in metaphysics of will to power [subjectity vs. subjectivity?]

HDG.FS.content: driving force of subject-object dichotomy: quest for absolute certainty (Gewissheit), interpreting truth as certainty > Descartes’ ego cogito, as upokeimenon, subjectum, fundamentum inconcussum, henceforth, nature only appears as Object for a Subject > prelude to this advent: Luther’s quest for certainty in faith, Galileo’s search for mathematical certainty of nature, all prepared by nominalist separation of words/things, Ockham’s formalism makes possible project (Entwurf) of mathematical key (Schlüssels) to world > grasp in one concept: unity of mathematical certainty & certainty of salvation
HDG.FS.linkedContent: driving force of subject-object dichotomy: quest for absolute certainty (Gewissheit), interpreting truth as certainty > Descartes’ ego cogito, as upokeimenon, subjectum, fundamentum inconcussum, henceforth, nature only appears as Object for a Subject > prelude to this advent: Luther’s quest for certainty in faith, Galileo’s search for mathematical certainty of nature, all prepared by nominalist separation of words/things, Ockham’s formalism makes possible project (Entwurf) of mathematical key (Schlüssels) to world > grasp in one concept: unity of mathematical certainty & certainty of salvation

HDG.FS.content: logos as gathering, “projects itself toward things that appear in their gathering” > for Greek thought, presencing of human is opening inception for oppositional presencing of World > alētheia: encounter (Begegnung) btwn that which presences and being is a self-opening, welcomes (Empfang) presence [a site, Ort?] > alētheia can’t be translated as truth
HDG.FS.linkedContent: logos as gathering, “projects itself toward things that appear in their gathering” > for Greek thought, presencing of human is opening inception for oppositional presencing of World > alētheia: encounter (Begegnung) btwn that which presences and being is a self-opening, welcomes (Empfang) presence [a site, Ort?] > alētheia can’t be translated as truth

HDG.FS.content: Being and Time asks not about a being but about “is,” addresses the question from perspective of meaning (Sinnes) of Being > “meaning of being”: understandable on basis (im Ausgang) of “project region” unfolded by “understanding of being” [hermeneutic circle?] > understanding: standing before, residing before (sich aufhalten vor), holding (halten) oneself at height of what stands before, being strong enough to hold out (auszuhalten)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Being and Time asks not about a being but about “is,” addresses the question from perspective of meaning (Sinnes) of Being > “meaning of being”: understandable on basis (im Ausgang) of “project region” unfolded by “understanding of being” [hermeneutic circle?] > understanding: standing before, residing before (sich aufhalten vor), holding (halten) oneself at height of what stands before, being strong enough to hold out (auszuhalten)

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger speaks of something inappropriate in formulation of “meaning of being,” possible to interpret “project” as a human performance, project only as structure of subjectivity (this is how Sartre reads it) > Heidegger countered this mistake w/ “truth of being,” still retaining meaning of project as opening disclosure (Erschliessung), and to assure that truth wasn’t confused w/ correctness, Heidegger explained it by “location (Ortschaft) of being,” which presupposes understanding of Ortseins des Ortes (place-being of place), hence Topologie des Seyns
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger speaks of something inappropriate in formulation of “meaning of being,” possible to interpret “project” as a human performance, project only as structure of subjectivity (this is how Sartre reads it) > Heidegger countered this mistake w/ “truth of being,” still retaining meaning of project as opening disclosure (Erschliessung), and to assure that truth wasn’t confused w/ correctness, Heidegger explained it by “location (Ortschaft) of being,” which presupposes understanding of Ortseins des Ortes (place-being of place), hence Topologie des Seyns

HDG.FS.content: meaning in “meaning of Being” defined re: project region, projection as accomplishment of Dasein, ek-static instancy in openness of Being: by ek-sisting, Dasein includes meaning > move to “truth of Being” emphasizes openness of Being itself, rather than openness of Dasein re: this openness of Being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: meaning in “meaning of Being” defined re: project region, projection as accomplishment of Dasein, ek-static instancy in openness of Being: by ek-sisting, Dasein includes meaning > move to “truth of Being” emphasizes openness of Being itself, rather than openness of Dasein re: this openness of Being

HDG.FS.content: Descartes/Pascal laugh about “motus est actus…” because can’t view what showed itself clearly to Aristotle: kinēsis, movedness as phenomenon > since Galileo, phora masters entire field, mathematical project of nature on basis (aufgrund) of homogenous space [nature as calculable, as masterable, Berechenbarkeit, Beherrschung]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Descartes/Pascal laugh about “motus est actus…” because can’t view what showed itself clearly to Aristotle: kinēsis, movedness as phenomenon > since Galileo, phora masters entire field, mathematical project of nature on basis (aufgrund) of homogenous space [nature as calculable, as masterable, Berechenbarkeit, Beherrschung]

HDG.FS.content: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]
